description: This file defines the 'Intro' page component for a LightningJS-based quiz application. It sets up UI layout with a title, welcome card, and start button, and handles navigation to the quiz page upon button press.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes component state with layout dimensions, colors, and text content.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Returns component dependencies, specifically Card and Button.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up button press handler to navigate to '/quiz' route.
